scenario_text.value:
Takuma...didn’t I tell you to go back and
join the others?

Still, it looks like we won. And it was all
thanks to him.

If it weren’t for your unshakable resolve,
I never could have taken this form.

Believing not only in your duty, but in your
own righteousness, you filled me with power.

In other words, you’re the one who led us to
this victory. Clearly.

My righteousness... That’s not just my ego
talking, then?

Ego, selfishness, call it what you will.
Sharing it with others makes it your justice.

I believe in your righteousness, Shuuji. Your
noble will resonates deep in my heart.
I see, so what’s your new name?

Cherubimon... That is the name of this new
form.

I’ll be here to support your path toward
righteousness.

Yes... Thank you, Cherubimon. You have no
idea how much I appreciate that.
